涼了半截.definition: felt a chill (in one's heart); (one's heart) sank

涼城.definition: Liangcheng county in Ulaanchab 烏蘭察布|乌兰察布[Wu1 lan2 cha2 bu4], Inner Mongolia

涼城縣.definition: Liangcheng county in Ulaanchab 烏蘭察布|乌兰察布[Wu1 lan2 cha2 bu4], Inner Mongolia

涼山.definition: see 涼山彝族自治州|凉山彝族自治州[Liang2shan1 Yi2zu2 Zi4zhi4zhou1]

涼山彝族自治州.pinyin: Liang2 shan1 Yi2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1
涼山彝族自治州.definition: Liangshan Yi Autonomous Prefecture, in Sichuan 四川省[Si4chuan1 Sheng3]

涼州.definition: Liangzhou district of Wuwei city 武威市[Wu3 wei1 shi4], Gansu

涼州區.definition: Liangzhou district of Wuwei city 武威市[Wu3 wei1 shi4], Gansu

涼席.definition: summer sleeping mat (e.g. of woven split bamboo); CL:張|张[zhang1],領|领[ling3]

涼拌.definition: to dress cold food with sauce; (slang) there's not much you can do about it (wordplay using 拌[ban4] instead of its homophone 辦|办[ban4])

涼涼.definition: slightly cold; cool; (neologism) (slang) to be done for; about to be obliterated; (of a place or a person) desolate
